aka: The Vanja Earthquake - Looking for Cechov

cast.name: 托尼·塞尔维洛 Toni Servillo
维尼乔·马尔基奥尼 Vinicio Marchioni
洛伦索·吉埃利 Lorenzo Gioielli
安德烈·康查洛夫斯基 Andrey Konchalovskiy
加布里埃莱·萨尔瓦托雷斯 Gabriele Salvatores

writer.name: 维尼乔·马尔基奥尼 Vinicio Marchioni

director.name: 维尼乔·马尔基奥尼 Vinicio Marchioni

trans_title: 凡尼亚地震：寻找契诃夫
The Vanja Earthquake - Looking for Cechov
introduction: Through the rehearsals and the tour of the show based on Uncle Vanya by Anton Chekhov, Vinicio Marchioni takes us to the Italian province destroyed by the earthquake and the places of the Russian writer. The Vanja earthquake starts from the Chekhovian masterpiece to investigate Italian post-earthquake immobility through the tragicomic gaze of Chekhov, making the public aware of the extraordinary human strength of the writer. A journey into the Italian theatrical creation; a journey in the earthquake that destroyed central Italy; a journey into the words and soul of Anton Chekhov.
chinese_title: 凡尼亚地震：寻找契诃夫
